Kudo, a Japanese hybrid martial art, will make its olympic debut in 2020 as a demonstration sport and Attuned is the proud sponsor of the US National Team. We met head coach James to talk about motivating athletes and team management. https:// blog.attuned.ai/2018/12/17/us- national-kudo-team-sponsor/?utm_source=twitter …

Competition in your work place is much more important than you may think. And social relationships less so. We’ve dug in to motivational profiles of thousands of Attuned survey respondents, and returned these anonymized trends. https:// blog.attuned.ai/2018/12/12/inf ographic-what-motivates-people-at-work-eng/?utm_source=twitter …

Maybe a lot of your technical staff was motivated by #progress ? Learning new skills, career development. So you just changed the culture to meet that need. Training can = culture.
That can be true, but for individuals with a low social relationship intrinsic motivator this isn't the case. And after they feel part of the group, can backfire - feels like wasted energy to them.
Definitely. Our data proves it. And algorithms get tighter and tighter to help prevent it. https:// twitter.com/CBVending/stat us/999319073895931904 …
Well, we can help with that. We were founded to help solve A
Awesome! Probably you figured out how to motivate them all individually as well. Maybe it came naturally? Not so for most people out there.

We dig Maslow, but think Herzberg needs more recognition #engagement #hr pic.twitter.com/AvWDh36aPd
